short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The must-have extension to improve sound quality of online music services, such as YouTube, Vimeo, SoundClouds, Netflix etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are looking a tool to improve sound quality for browser? The Sound Enhancement is a very good tool for you.
You can select sound configuration, such as Pop, Jazz, Rock etc. Otherwise, you can do it manually.

NOTE: If you cannot switch video to the fullscreen mode, please press F11. This is a Chromium bug that Chromium dev still cannot solve yet.

ℹ️ The functionality of the extension periodically updates its configuration by fetching sound themes from external sources. To ensure optimal performance of the sound enhancement themes, we periodically improve them based on the latest insights and update them within the extension.

Hope you enjoy it!
